description: There is not a big effort to get here. Its is a beautiful hike during the fall. the color's were amazing. The trail was great with some small inclines coming back but nothing to rough. Not sure about the Kms it took me about 20 min to walk there
directions: 44.913483, -65.335944 In Bridgetown take the Hampton Mountain Rd towards the Valley view provincial park. Go up the North mountain and then turn right on Shore Road till you see civic number 8381 on your left. There is a gate. Park and walk all the way down till you see the glass house on your right. if you keep going you'll come to beautiful beach!
title: Glass House
